title: (x) Heat magazine typeface - TF Forever {Marc O}
content: Does anyone know what typeface does the english magazine “Heat” uses in headlines?
author: insusi

comments.content: Can you post a sample please?

From what I remember, without having a copy, I think it’s Rian Hughes’ Paralucent.

Nick Cooke
it’s not Paralucent, the”g” is totally different

No, not that one!

Nick Cooke
wich “that one”? everywhere on the internet paraluicent is mentioned, but it’s not paralucent.

I believe it’s TF Forever, perhaps artificially squeezed.

[http://www.treacyfaces.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060512034715/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/)
thank you marcox. TF Forever it is. Thanks a bunch 2 u all.
